title: Deluxe Canvas – Luxury Shopify Development & Bold Brand Identity
description: Crafted a premium Shopify experience for Deluxe Canvas, a luxury wall art brand. Focused on visual storytelling, modern animations, and a bold color palette to elevate the brand’s exclusivity. The website delivers a smooth, high-end eCommerce experience with seamless navigation, optimized performance, and immersive product presentation.

title: Frag Perfumes – Nature-Inspired Shopify Store & Elegant Brand Design
description: Developed an elegant Shopify store for Frag Perfumes, blending soft natural hues with minimalistic design principles. The site communicates freshness, purity, and emotion through clean UI elements and fluid transitions. A refined visual identity reinforces the brand’s promise of connecting nature and luxury through scent.

title: Say Hay – Minimal Shopify Development for a Fresh Juice Brand
description: Designed and developed a clean, minimal Shopify site for Say Hay, a fresh juice and wellness company. The aesthetic approach emphasizes simplicity and freshness — mirroring the brand’s organic philosophy. Every page was optimized for user flow, product storytelling, and conversion-focused design.

title: Sharky – Shopify Website Design & Branding for a Startup
description: Delivered a full Shopify solution for Sharky, an ocean-inspired startup brand. The website integrates vibrant visuals, bold typography, and an energetic brand style. Optimized for performance, the site reflects a confident, modern startup ready to make waves in the market.
